title: How Trump's travel ban hits this South Dakota doctor
text: Dr. Alaa Al Nofal is a Syrian pediatric endocrinologist working in South Dakota. He's treating patients in an underserved community and he's one of many doctors feeling the ripple effects of President Donald Trump's executive order on immigration.
summary:
Dr. Alaa Al Nofal is a Syrian pediatric endocrinologist working in South Dakota.
He's treating patients in an underserved community and he's one of many doctors feeling the ripple effects of President Donald Trump's executive order on immigration.
